title: Divine Teardrop: Polki Kundan Jhumka
materials: Rose Quartz drop. The Polki diamonds are set in traditional Kundan setting.
features: This unique Jhumka design showcases a blend of traditional Kundan craftsmanship with a modern sensibility. The design begins with a square Polki diamond surrounded by smaller diamonds. Underneath it a triangular green tourmaline gemstone adds a pop of color. A delicate Rose Quartz teardrop hangs elegantly, adding a touch of femininity. The Kundan setting is meticulously handcrafted, enhancing the brilliance of the Polki diamonds.
colors: Pink (Rose Quartz). The traditional gold and white combination is accentuated by the modern addition of green and pink.
occasions: and festive occasions like Diwali or Sankranti. Also suitable for formal parties and contemporary events.
description: This Jhumka embodies the rich heritage of Hyderabadi jewelry design while incorporating modern gemstone elements. The Polki diamonds possess a unique, timeless appeal. The combination of Tourmaline and Rose Quartz adds a touch of unconventional elegance. The Kundan setting ensures the durability and security of the stones. It's a versatile piece that can be worn for both traditional and modern events.
